verbs.description: It [V: has] been a bad month for the giant telecom / TV provider . Cord cutting losses at Directv have proven a persistent headwind to company financials . New controversy tied to hot - in - the - news payments to former Trump lawyer Cohen is not helping matters . Merger between Sprint and T - Mobile , and the outcome of the Time Warner case , creates uncertain future for AT&T shareholders . Click here to read the full article
